channel.title: Motnemagno.com on .NET Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Motnemagno.com on .NET Ramblings

item.title: Introducing PDF Diff: Compare PDFs Privately in Your Browser
item.description: Hey friends! I'm super excited to share a new tool I've been working on that solves a problem I bet many of you have faced: how do you quickly compare two PDF documents to see what changed? Enter PDF Diff!Landing page for PDF Diff Link to article: https://montemagno.com/introducing-pdf-diff-compare-pdfs-privately-in-your-browser/

item.title: Introducing Oh My Posh Visual Configurator: Finally, a Drag-and-Drop Terminal Theme Builder! ✨
item.description: A web-based drag-and-drop builder for oh-my-posh that makes creating beautiful terminal prompts actually fun! Link to article: https://montemagno.com/introducing-oh-my-posh-visual-configurator-finally-a-drag-and-drop-terminal-theme-builder/

item.title: Building a Complete FIRE Calculator App with GitHub Copilot in One Chat Session
item.description: In 30 minutes with GitHub Copilot, VS Code, and Claude Opus 4.5 I built my ultimate FIRE calcultor app that is private, secure, and free! Link to article: https://montemagno.com/building-a-complete-fire-calculator-app-with-github-copilot-in-one-chat-session/
